root.subject: {{Subject}}
root.dslOnProduce: - log: gmail_to_calendar_start_data - extractDates: subject - extractDates: bodyText - filter: - $not: $isEmpty: $: extractDates - - convertForWebhook: - $dateFormat: - $top: $: extractDates - YYYY/MM/DD - $: subject - $: bodyText - log: gmail_to_calendar_end_data - sendToWebhook: google_calendar
